<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flourish and Ruin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2399) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes. You can cast [_field of life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=114) and [_tangling creepers_](/Spells.aspx?ID=331) as 6th-level primal innate spells once per day each. You become an expert in primal spell attack rolls and primal spell DCs.
name: Flourish and Ruin
